D

dot(AsciiPainter, int, int) - Method in class asciipanel.LinearBrush
Subclasses must implement this method to draw each point on the line.
dot(AsciiPainter, int, int) - Method in class imageeditor.CharacterBrush
Writes the character specified at construction at the point specified by arguments, using foreground and background colors of the provided painter.
dot(AsciiPainter, int, int) - Method in class imageeditor.EraserBrush
Replaces the character at the specified point with a space.
DRAKE_10x10 - Static variable in class asciipanel.AsciiFont
The DRAKE_10x10 font
DRAW_RECT - imageeditor.ToolType
An enum item representing the rectangle draw tool.
drawDot() - Method in class asciipanel.AsciiPainter
Draws a single dot with the active brush at the pen's position.
drawLine(int, int) - Method in class asciipanel.AsciiPainter
Draws a line with the active brush from the pen's position to (penX + deltaX, penY + deltaY).
drawLineTo(int, int) - Method in class asciipanel.AsciiPainter
Draws a line with the active brush from the pen's position to (endX, endY).
drawRaster(AsciiRaster, boolean, boolean) - Method in class asciipanel.AsciiPainter
Draws a given raster into the surface, with optional transparency.
drawRasterChars(AsciiRaster, boolean, boolean) - Method in class asciipanel.AsciiPainter
Draws characters from a given raster into the surface, with optional transparency.
DrawRectTool - Class in imageeditor
Implements the MouseInputListener interface to provide the behavior of the rectangle draw tool.
DrawRectTool(EditorStateModel) - Constructor for class imageeditor.DrawRectTool
Initializes an instance of the rectangle draw tool
